Install plotmics + Session info

Adrià Mitjavila Ventura

Source: vignettes/00-install_and_sessioninfo.Rmd
00-install_and_sessioninfo.Rmd

Last updated: 2021-10-04

Install plotmics 

# install devtools if not installed
if(!require(devtools)){ install.packages("devtools") }

# install plotmics if not installed
if(!require(plotmics)){ devtools::install_github("amitjavilaventura/plotmics") }
# load plotmics
library(plotmics)
